document_data.name: Wolmad Eaglewing
document_data.mainbody: '''Wolmad Eaglewing''', or the self-appointed '''Lord of the [[Sundabar Vale|Vale]]''', was the acting war-leader of the [[Sky Pony Tribe]] of [[Uthgardt]] [[barbarian]]s living on the northern side of the [[Nether Mountains]]. He harbored a deep grudge against the [[dwarves]], especially those from [[Citadel Felbarr]].
document_data.Personality: Wolmad was known as a reckless but charismatic leader.
document_data.Activities:
Sometime around [[1372 DR]], War-leader Wolmad usurped power from the dying chieftain and led the Sky Ponies in a campaign of banditry in [[Old Delzoun]]. He singled out the dwarves of the region, often raiding their passing caravans.

After years of fighting with the [[orc]]s of the Nether and [[Rauvin Mountains]], Wolmad developed a twisted sense of ownership of the valleys between and demanded monetary tribute for anyone passing through what he referred to as "his lands".
